projects.name: Frontida Records
projects.description: Frontida Records is a USC student initiative to build an Electronic Health Record system for refugees in Greece

projects.name: Responsive News Site
projects.description: With the usage of APIs by The Guardian and New York Times, a site with quintessential features of a blog/news site was built using React for front end and Node.js for backend

projects.name: Android News App
projects.description: This application is an extension to the Responsive News Website mentioned above, with additional features to plot frequency charts for specific keywords as well as to display current weather conditions.

projects.name: Traffic Signal Optimization
projects.description: Designed a python project inculcating predictive Machine Learning algorithms to increase the efficacy of current traffic signals utilizing some commonly found datasets.

projects.name: Android Stock Market App
projects.description: This is an  an android mobile application which stores essential details of companies regarding stock market and builds graphs according to their growth charts.
